text: Andrea Laura Barber (born July 3, 1976) is an American former child actress who acts mainly in TV. She played Kimmy Gibbler in the sitcom Full House. Before that, she played Carrie Brady in the soap opera Days of our Lives. Barber was born in Los Angeles. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:1976 births Category:Living people
title: Andrea Barber
